alfredsnippet.snippet:
df1 = df[["state","child","teen", "adult"]].groupby(df["state"]).sum()
df1.plot(kind='line',
         xticks=range(51),
         rot=90,
         marker='o',
         title='',
         style= {'child':'-', 'teen':'--','adult':'-.'},
         figsize=(12,8));
alfredsnippet.name: plot line pandas
